channel.title: Aviations on Making and Flying
channel.description: Recent content in Aviations on Making and Flying

item.title: aviation
item.description:
Training/Endorsements

  • Private Pilot License
  • Mountain Flying Course
  • High-Performance Endorsement
  • Tailwheel Endorsement
  • Spin Training

TODO

  • Complex Endorsement / PA28 Checkout
  • IFR Rating
  • Upset and unusual attitude recovery
  • Cirrus transition course

Aircrafts

Owned

  • Maule M5-180C

Checked Out

  • Cessna 162
  • Cessna 172N
  • Cessna 172S
  • Cessna 182S
  • Citabria 7KCAB

Flown with CFI

  • Citabria 7GCBC
  • Husky AA-1B
  • American Champion Scout (Floats)
  • Cirrus SR20
  • PA-11S Cub Special

Right Seat (passenger)

  • Cirrus SR22T
  • Bonanza A36

  • Renton (KRNT)
  • Pierce County (KPLU)
  • Boeing Field (KBFI)
  • Paine Field (KPAE)
  • Crest (S36)
  • Auburn (S50)

  • Auburn Academy (WA84)
  • Astoria (KAST)

  • Desert Aire (M94)
  • Toledo (KTDO)
  • Strom Field (39P)
  • Swanson (2W3)

California

  • Reid-Hillview (KRHV)
  • Frazier Lake (1C9)
  • Salinas (KSNS)
  • Hollister (KCVH)
  • Columbia (O22)
  • Pine Mountain Lake (E45)

  • Langley (W10)
  • Cle Elum (S93)
  • Roche Harbor (W39)

Navigation/Radio

  • Across the Cascades (Snoqualmie Pass)
  • RNT-BFI Stadiums Transition
  • Fly around Mt Rainier
  • SeaTac (Burien) Transition

TODO

  • Fly to Canada (and back)
  • Public Fly-In (AOPA or other)
  • Oshkosh

Tools

  • ForeFlight
  • Stratus II
  • Bad Elf GPS Pro
  • Jeppesen PPL Ground School
  • Jeppesen G1000 Bundle (VFR)
  • MyFlightBook.com
  • Sporty’s Aspen Bundle

Books

  • The Killing Zone, 2nd Edition: How and Why Pilots Die (Paul Craig)
  • There I Wuz! Adventures from 3 decades in the Sky (Eric Auxier)
  • The Last Bush Pilots (Eric Auxier)
  • Bush Pilot Way (Bill Quirk)
  • Vol de Nuit (Antoine de St Exupery)

TODO

  • Beyond the Checkride (Howard Fried)
  • Stick and Rudder (Wolfgang Langewiesche)
